summary: Successfully completed 3 commits. Committed 3 file change(s)

commits.message:
chore(log): update last run log with latest execution

Update .kcmt/last_run.json to reflect the most recent kcmt run on
2025-10-14, including a new timestamp, switched provider from Anthropic
to XAI with grok-code-fast-1 model, updated performance metrics (longer
duration, lower rate), and adjusted counts (11 files processed
successfully instead of 12 failures). Added successful commit details
with messages, enabled auto-push, and updated summary to indicate
completion. This maintains an accurate record of tool execution for
debugging and benchmarking purposes.

docs(readme): specify languages in code blocks

Added 'json' and 'shell' language specifiers to fenced code blocks in
README.md to improve syntax highlighting. Introduced a new benchmarking
command example and corrected indentation in API usage snippets for
better readability and consistency.

subjects: chore(log): update last run log with latest execution
